article.description: DeWayne Russell had 20 points and six assists to help Grand Canyon beat Houston 78-69 at the Global Sports Classic on Monday night.
article.headline: Grand Canyon gets big win over Houston 78-69
article.linkText: Grand Canyon gets big win over Houston 78-69
article.story: LAS VEGAS -- DeWayne Russell had 20 points and six assists to help Grand Canyon beat Houston 78-69 at the Global Sports Classic on Monday night. Grand Canyon (10-2) has won three straight, including a 52-45 victory against San Diego State. The Antelopes went up by seven when Joshua Braun hit back-to-back 3s with just under five minutes to play. Later, Gerard Martin had a key block on Rob Gray Jr.'s shot attempt and Russell hit two free throws to give the Antelopes a 70-62 lead with 1:45 left. Braun finished with 13 points and shot 3 for 4 from beyond the arc. Grandy Glaze added 10 points off the bench. Galen Robinson Jr., finished with career-high 18 points for the Cougars (8-2). Gray added 17 points for Houston and Devonta Pollard had 10. It was the first-ever meeting between the two schools.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
